initial_state: The user is on a board page with at least one list already created and displayed.
steps: Locate the list you wish to delete.
Click on the three dots in the top-right corner of the list to open the options menu.
Select the 'Delete List' option from the menu.
In the confirmation pop-up, confirm the deletion action.
expected_state: The selected list is removed from the board. The list count on the board is reduced by one.
